content:
In this dataset, annotators are asked whether text is offensive. There are three possible labels: not offensive (0), maybe (1), offensive (2)

Target Example:
Text: Make the best of the west coast. Enter to win everything you need to plan an epic drive up the scenic west coast: https://t.co/HpoPJbKdOE
Annotation from annotator:
Your output should be a single integer corresponding to the label.
